ygData.subject: Re: A pred inside Maxi's base
ygData.msgSnippet: KitKat:: She looked at Cooley and let her optics close slightly, I don t owe you a thing. I didn t ask to be brought here. I was in search of my own base.

KitKat::

She looked at Cooley and let her optics close slightly, "I don't owe 
you a thing. I didn't ask to be brought here. I was in search of my 
own base."  She crossed her arms in front of her. "Besides, why  in 
the pit would a maximal save a pred anyway. You know we would not 
have done the same."  She turned her back to him, but used the shiney 
part of the CR door as a mirror to keep her eyes on him. "Your friend 
mentioned some sort of truce earlier. Perhaps I may put that concept 
to the test. Take me to your mess hall. I'm starved." 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> Cooley:
> Droping out of The cloaked watch he has been doing on the CR. "Hold 
up all of you, I have been watching her and the reason why the alarms 
went off is becouse no one was watching the timer. Now where they. 
She was badly injured and was brought here by Malice and Wolfboy. Now 
Back off you two." Cooley looks at Winlord and Kup. then to 
KitKat, "As for you I got a close eye on you. Little miss. Besides 
you still owe me one." He smiles.
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord/Kup::
> 
> Windlord arrived to CR's rooms and he looked KitKat and 
> shouted"FREEZE!!!! how you dare come in our base, PRED!!!"
> 
> "Hold on, Windlord"said Kup "We should interogate her first... 
> WE... "
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > KitKat::
> > 
> > She took a few steps  back and growled at the door.  She could 
> smell

> unavoidable.
> >

> > >

> > >

> > > 
> > > Kup and Windlord ran towards CR's trying to find out what's 
goin 
> on

> > > > 
> > > > She finally stretched and awoke fully in the CR chamber.  She 
> > > watched 
> > > > as the links and connections disengaged and the chamer opened 
> up 
> > > for 
> > > > her.  She stepped out and looked around. Her nose told her 
she 
> > > wasn't 
> > > > in a pred base.  She transformed into wolf mode and started 
> BASE 
> > > > INTRUDER ALERT STARTED SOUNDING OFF.  She closed her optics 
> and 
> > > > winces, "Damn, this just isn't my eon is it?" she muttered 
and 
> > > > prepared for battle.
